topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XXVIII, Organization and Management of Foreign Policy
topic.body: This volume is part of a Foreign Relations subseries that documents the most important foreign policy issues of the Jimmy Carter administration. This volume documents the organization and management of U.S. foreign policy during that administration.
topic.image-description: Book cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XXVIII, Organization and Management of Foreign Policy
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
